rooms.description: A spacious lobby with wheelchair-accessible ramps and automatic doors. Features a reception desk and coat closet.
rooms.vastu_consideration: East facing entrance to attract positive energy.

rooms.description: Open-plan living space that integrates kitchen, dining, and sitting areas. Features built-in seating and ample natural light from north windows.
rooms.vastu_consideration: North-east corner recommended for open spaces.

rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen adjacent to the living area with wheelchair accessibility features like lower countertops and accessible appliances.
rooms.vastu_consideration: South-west corner placement for better energy flow.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Accessible layout ensures easy mobility.
Comfortable guest room with integrated storage solutions and wheelchair-friendly design.
Modern en-suite bathroom designed with accessibility in mind including grab bars and low-set fixtures.
Small utility room for storage of cleaning supplies, additional pantry items, and housekeeping essentials.

openings.description: Main entry door with automatic sliding mechanism for wheelchair access.
West-facing balcony overlooking the swimming pool area, providing a view and relaxation space.
openings.vastu_consideration: Balconies on west side are acceptable if balanced with other openings.

openings.description: Large windows installed to allow natural light and enhance ventilation in the living area.
openings.vastu_consideration: Windows should be placed for optimal energy flow.

openings.description: Accessible door leading to the swimming pool area with ramping facility.
openings.vastu_consideration: Placed on the south-west side for water element balance.

rooms.description: Expanded master suite with walk-in closet and private balcony. Designed for ease of mobility with wheelchair-accessible pathways.
Cozy guest bedroom featuring storage and accessibility features.
Second-floor bathroom with accessible fixtures including grab bars and lower sinks.
rooms.vastu_consideration: Placed in the south-west area to balance water elements.

rooms.description: Additional storage area for utilities, seasonal items, and household supplies.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible staircase with gentle incline and railings for safety.
Door providing access from the first-floor master bedroom suite to the private balcony.
Additional window openings designed for enhanced natural light and ventilation in guest rooms.
openings.vastu_consideration: Optimal placement based on room orientation.

notes.irregular_plot_design: The design accommodates an irregular plot shape by orienting the main entrance on the east side, ensuring a balanced Vastu layout despite plot constraints.
notes.vastu_adjustments: Special attention was given to Vastu principles including room positioning and directional alignments. Openings are oriented to harness natural energy while maintaining privacy and accessibility.
notes.wheelchair_accessibility: All pathways, doorways, and fixtures have been designed for wheelchair access with appropriate ramps, low-set counters, and unobstructed circulation spaces.
